cite_metadata:
Menne, M.J., I. Durre, R.S. Vose, B.E. Gleason, and T.G. Houston, 2012:  An overview 
of the Global Historical Climatology Network-Daily Database.  Journal of Atmospheric 
and Oceanic Technology, 29, 897-910, doi:10.1175/JTECH-D-11-00103.1.
description: GHCN (Global Historical Climatology Network)-Daily is an integrated database of daily climate summaries from land surface stations across the globe. Like its monthly counterpart (GHCN-Monthly) , GHCN-Daily is comprised of daily climate records from numerous sources that have been integrated and subjected to a common suite of quality assurance reviews.
name: Global Historical Climatology Network - Daily
